title: About Me
text: I'm a frontend developer from Vienna. I'm specialized in HTML, CSS, accessibility and performance. If you want to get in touch, write me an [E-Mail](mailto:manuel@matuzo.at) or find me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mmatuzo), [CodePen](https://codepen.io/matuzo/) or [Medium](http://medium.com/@matuzo).
description: My name ist Manuel Matuzovic and I'm a frontend developer from Vienna.
